ratings.question_text: Your level of engagement with the course was:
What is your overall assessment of this course?
The course was well organized to facilitate student learning.
I received clear feedback that improved my learning.
Relative to other courses you have taken at Yale, the level of intellectual challenge of this course was:
Relative to other courses you have taken at Yale, the workload of this course was:

narratives.question_text: What knowledge, skills, and insights did you develop by taking this course?
comments: I learned advanced French grammar and useful vocabulary that would be useful when discussing a piece of literature.
I strengthened my understanding of key grammatical concepts and improved my vocabulary, ability to write concisely, and speak more comfortably.

narratives.question_text: What are the strengths and weaknesses of this course and how could it be improved?
comments: Though language classes are difficult in a virtual format, I do not have any complaints about this class. All of the assignments felt purposeful and the class discussions and activities helped solidify the material.

Strengths: great teacher, super interesting readings and films
Weaknesses: wasn't as good online, as languages are always better practised in person (but obviously this couldn't be helped during a global pandemic!)

narratives.question_text: Would you recommend this course to another student? Please explain.
comments: Yes, I would recommend this course to another student. Despite it being intense, this course helped me to improve my French significantly. Not only does this course provided me language practice, I also learned about the history of the francophone countries and the social problems that France is currently facing.

I would recommend this class to any student that is serious about French. It is a lot of work and probably not a great fit for someone just looking to get a credit, but it is worth it for anyone who wants to study abroad or take higher level French courses.
Yes! To any student interested in learning more French and about French culture

narratives.question_text: The Canvas course site allowed me to identify and access required course materials easily.
